messages.title: UKIP: ABOLISH TUITION FEES FOR KEY DEGREES
messages.content: EU STUDENTS FAIL TO REPAY STUDENT LOANS

messages.title: HONOURING THE MILITARY COVENANT
messages.content: THE SAFETY OF THE PEOPLE SHALL BE THE HIGHEST LAW - Cicero

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP plans to abolish tuition fees for students taking approved degrees who live, work and pay tax in the UK afterwards.
UKIP will increase the NHS budget by £3 billion.
UKIP will control immigration, implementing a point-based immigration system.
UKIP will cut foreign aid spending.
UKIP will increase the size of the military and do not support a European army.
UKIP aims to address the shortage in primary schools by creating more places.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voters find that if you vote UKIP you get UKIP.

issues.economy: HOW UKIP WILL TACKLE THE DEFICIT - UKIP plans to leave the EU saving £12 billion per annum, cut foreign aid budget in half saving £9 billion per annum, scrap HS2, and abolish inheritance tax.
issues.education: 400,000 EXTRA PRIMARY SCHOOL PLACES NEEDED - UKIP will bring back grammar schools and promote smaller class sizes
issues.environment: Douglas Carswell campaigns for cheaper energy bills
issues.governance: Democracy and the Constitution - UKIP plans to leave the EU to prevent the loss of control over Britain's democratic rights.
issues.health: UKIP WILL INCREASE THE NHS BUDGET BY £3 BILLION - UKIP's pledge to Britain for a viable and efficient National Health Service, ensuring that GPs' surgeries are open at least one evening per week.
issues.immigration: A FAIRER UK IMMIGRATION SYSTEM - UKIP proposes points-based migration policy and will change immigration policies so that people with skills the country needs are welcomed.

housing.content: Housing and town planning - UKIP will protect the Green Belt.

images.caption: Peter Grace pictured next to Nigel Farage.
